alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; South Central Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 10 at 3:22PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Duval County through 345 PM EST... At 322 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Arlington, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Unf, Mandarin, Arlington, Jacksonville Beach, Atlantic Beach, Neptune Beach, Baymeadows, Mayport, Craig Field and San Pablo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
